lenders.occupational_info: Rick owns a small business, Susan is a lawyer, and Chewy (the dog) runs the household.

lenders.name: Hudson & Lawson

lenders.occupational_info: We are brothers, 9 & 7 years old. We both go to school. during the week and like going to the beach on the weekends.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to watch other people get what they need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a university in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. I study medicine. I'm interested in people from other cultures and want to learn about them.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I loan to make a difference in the world, one woman at a time ...

lenders.name: Margaret

lenders.occupational_info: If someone is having a hard time breathing, I figure out how to help them out.

lenders.name: Peter 'n' Susie

I WORK IN A BAKERY IN A LARGE GROCERY
STORE.

lenders.loan_because: There is a risk regardless of who you loan to.  I loan to foreign countries, because this way I can be sensitive to the world around me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an overseas chaplain.

lenders.name: Silvia and family
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves, i believe that no matter how tough it is sometimes there is always someone else who needs more help.

Contribution to kiva actually reach the ones who needs most, there for I'm excited.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in psychology supporting people who want to make their mental/emotional/spiritual lives better.

lenders.name: Judy

lenders.loan_because: To give a battler a go

lenders.occupational_info: I sell houses and blocks of land.

lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.

lenders.loan_because: to try and make a difference ...

lenders.occupational_info: I go to University where i study teaching and business...I also have 3 jobs to help me get by.

lenders.name: Sheryl

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: cela nous aide à réaliser des rêves...

lenders.name: Ahnie
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed with enough to share.

lenders.name: Geneva Girls
lenders.loan_because: We live in the U.S. and have so many wonderful opportunities available to us.  In raising our daughter(s), we hope to instill in them the strong desire to help others knowing that life is about sharing and caring for others.  When we adopted our daughter 2005 we noticed that her name was given with "Best Wishes" and "Hope" that she would be happy.  We feel that the best way to accomplish this is by giving this to others.  The world we live in will be a reflection of what we give from ourselves to others.
lenders.occupational_info: By joining forces with other families who have been blessed by adoption, we hope to provide support to women in other parts of the world who could benefit from our help.  Women are very fortunate in the U.S. to have so many opportunities to become anything (including business owners).  We hope to support women's business in other areas of the world where opportunities do not come so easily.  We send "Best Wishes" and "Hope that you are Happy" and successful.

lenders.name: Donal
lenders.loan_because: This appears to be a simple, low risk, practical approach to helping somebody with real needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange long term financing for productive (income earning) projects in developing countries.

lenders.name: Arthur Family
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: little things count.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in IT.

lenders.name: len,adrienne and family
lenders.loan_because: we like for people who dont have the ability to self fund there ventures to find support through our family
lenders.occupational_info: giving back to other communities

lenders.name: Raquel and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We love to help others.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can, and therefore to do anything less would be wrong
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the people of Bolton, England.  My job is to use the money that is collected from the people of Bolton in taxes to help support older people who live in Bolton who can not live at home safely.  I ask them what help they need to stay safe in their own homes and I then try to give them that help.  It may be getting someone to help them wash or dress, or a hot meal delivered every day.  Anything that will allow them to live safely at home for as long as possible. PS My dog Pippin says 'Hi!'

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: We want to be able to help people improve their lives.

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to change someones life

lenders.name: Shanlee
lenders.loan_because: Just a small amount of money can make such a big difference to someone on the other side of the world who is less fortunate.

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.loan_because: for so little we all together can do so much difference for them, it's just a great feeling.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: i should

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I know that most people are honest and that sometimes a small helping hand can make a big difference, insights learned from being blind and in a wheelchair.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on programmes for computers, mostly for small businesses.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can make the difference in someones else life and that makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate the access of information

lenders.name: Manny
lenders.loan_because: I've been there and done that!

lenders.name: Tomcat
lenders.loan_because: Helping a particular person seems somehow better than just sending money to some faceless charity.  And of course, if it gets paid back, we can loan the same money out again.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineer. I design gas furnaces for heating of homes.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way!  I am a firm believer in microfinance, and Kiva.org offers everyone the opportunity to make a huge difference to a life by empowering individuals to provide for themselves.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a simple solution to a complex problem.  Poverty is rarely a natural disaster but a result of inequitable and unjust human social factors.  It is within our power to say "people, this is not good enough!".  Thanks Kiva for providing such a mechanism and shining a bright light in a darkening world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a counsellor, so people come to me to talk over problems.  I help them come to understand what has caused their problems and assist them to discover ways to resolve and prevent these.

lenders.name: tracy
lenders.loan_because: I can see who Im helping out & it feels good

lenders.loan_because: I care about the people of Lebanon and want to help, I have been there and feel a connection with the people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a waitress and work hard for my money, but feel fortunate that I have a job and can help other people, when i am able

lenders.name: Sally-Ann

lenders.loan_because: it can empower others
lenders.occupational_info: I am at university as an older student., studying for my doctorate in psychology. I admire people that can take a stand and help their lives and their families lives by empowering themselves.

lenders.loan_because: It is one small way to share the bounty we enjoy in this country and a way of letting people know the true "American spirit"
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investigative TV reporter in the city of Atlanta, Georgia.

lenders.occupational_info: Making people outstanding!

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I receive great pleasure from assisting people to step into their personal power and reap rewards for their efforts.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Credit Union, which is a non-profit financial cooperative.

lenders.name: Monica

lenders.name: Julie

lenders.occupational_info: Capturing the spoken word and recording it for posterity.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people out of poverty.

lenders.name: Carol

lenders.name: Tim

I loan because I can...and it is the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: CBH
lenders.loan_because: It is a good use of my money.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: where we are born is an accident of birth. I believe I should use what chance has given me to enrich the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Finance and History at the University of Florida.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: Its a small amount which put together with everyone elses will really make an impact.  This site is a great idea.

lenders.name: HUGH C.

lenders.occupational_info: Just trying to do my share.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I care, we have to do what we can!

lenders.name: Lynsey
lenders.loan_because: There's no excuse not to!

lenders.name: Oma & Elo

lenders.name: Kirsty
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Gary

lenders.occupational_info: I am now semi-retired and just relaxing and have a good time.

lenders.loan_because: We feel that every woman should have the opportunity to better themselves and support their children through hard work and initiative.

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.name: Sharondale
lenders.loan_because: I believe that 1 person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students about how society works and how to change things to make society better.

lenders.name: Abel
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what God has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: Ministry

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to bless others. I am trying to learn what community really is and to do my part to establish relationships and aid in times of need.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am fortunate enough not to work as I complete my studies. I will be graduating from college in December of 2007.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the programme and I believe in helping people in other nations. I'm pleased with my personal situation and believe that when you have so much in terms of privilege that its your duty to help others. I am constantly telling my students to make a difference and this is one way I can do that. I love the concept of letting people help themselves as well. I think it shows them that we're not being paternalistic and that we are giving people credit for their own intelligence and initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English, History and Political Sciences at the secondary (high school) level.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I like the personal connection with the person I'm lending to.  I like to know who and where the money is going and for what purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I do home visits with new Moms and babies to help them get off to a good start together.

lenders.name: Cherie Maher
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we should all give a little to others who really need to advance their lives or just to survive. I loan because i wish there was no suffering in the world and giving is the greatest gift in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate the community about pest species that arrive in our country through different means of transport. I educate them on how they can help to prevent them from spreading and how the pests can damage our environment and wildlife

lenders.name: Lianne
lenders.loan_because: because i want to see people move forward and know that in some small way i am making a difference
lenders.occupational_info: i am a  single mother of 3 children and am currently studying at university to better our lives and our future

lenders.name: Kyley
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to be born in a great place like Canada where oppurtunities and school are everywhere. I think everyone deserves the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I really want to become a nurse, specifically with baby deliveries so right now its lockdown time with studying and working to pay for school!

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Lots of little changes build up to a great big difference : 0 )

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: It's a simple way to help someone else.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that don't know computers to use theirs...

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.loan_because: I do believe in the adage "teach a person to fish" and I see this loan doing that for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired now but as a financial auditor teaching accounting systems was my emphasis.

lenders.name: Sean & Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: We believe that micro credit is the key to helping people out of poverty through the power of their own motivation.

lenders.name: Lona
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a more secure place by helping people individually become more secure.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise teachers of English, social studies, and Spanish.  Some of the social studies students in my school helped pick the people to whom I lend.  This helps the students understand other parts of the world and have a connection to people outside their range of experience.

lenders.occupational_info: I create software that allows computers to communicate with each other.

lenders.name: Jerry

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am human. You are human. We are brothers and sisters.

lenders.name: Helen

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Fiona and Scott
lenders.loan_because: We have been so blessed and want to share with others to help them on their life's journey.  We are all precious in God's eyes.

lenders.name: Amber and Hunter

lenders.occupational_info: We are high school students

lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody should have the same opportunity that I have to better their lives.  I think loans are better than just giving money because it helps people feel better about themselves, more empowered.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist working in hot glass. I sell my work at art fairs around the United States.

lenders.name: Chuck G
lenders.loan_because: I know how tough it is to run a small business and am grateful for the loans that i have received. I thought i would use some of my loans to help some others get a step up.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a wholesale and retail business focussed on the avalanche safety business.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help those less fortunate than me obtain a measure of financial independence.

lenders.name: LepusReg
lenders.loan_because: I want to see disadvantaged people succeed in life!
lenders.occupational_info: I farm (raise organic beef, chicken, ducks and geese) and also raise and train hunting dogs.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help the forest grow back

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.loan_because: Other people have it much tougher than me, so I want to help them out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard and it pays off, I am a straight A student!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe microcredit is changing the world and am absolutely blessed to have the opportunity to participate in it

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: there is always someone who needs the money more than I do

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: adequate funding, along with these peoples' ideas and drive, will improve both their lives and everyone else that they "touch".
lenders.occupational_info: Our firm provides finance, accounting, income tax and general management services for start-up companies.

lenders.name: Staff of VGRS
lenders.loan_because: I fundraise at work to raise money for charity. Staff from our workplace, VGRS, are avid supporters. I give Kiva about a third of the total amount raised over the year. Other charities receive the rest.
lenders.occupational_info: VGRS is the Victorian Government Reporting Service in Victoria, Australia. We have a total of about 90 staff members who create, archive and distribute court transcript.

lenders.name: diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe empowering women makes a difference to peace.
lenders.occupational_info: Another Mother

lenders.name: MaryAnne
lenders.loan_because: Of the impact it can make.  Something so small can make huge change.  I hope that this small gesture will flow to others.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something interesting and useful with my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student in Prince George, British Columbia, Canada.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: it feels so good to help others - it gives me a chance to pay forward what I've been given
lenders.occupational_info: I find books for people  and have the books shipped to them.    Customers pay me for the cost of the book and the shipping charge.  I also sell  my own inventory of out-of-print books online at my webpage and other sites.

lenders.name: Robbie & Joe
lenders.loan_because: We live in a very small world.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on large IT projects.

lenders.name: IFA
lenders.occupational_info: We are a school based club with an interest in  promoting global citizenship.

lenders.name: Shoshanna
lenders.loan_because: I know even a small amount can make a difference.

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: I can. You should too.

lenders.name: Hilda
lenders.loan_because: There are a lot of needy people around the world.  It is our duty to help them; if we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I LOVE to travel, going to concerts and going to museums. In my work I teach English to spanish speaking children and translate the letters from English to Spanish for the parents in the school who don't know English.

lenders.name: raj
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should have an opportunity to do something in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people with mental/physical difficulties to live a normal life.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the most participatory and appropriate forms of assistance you can offer someone. I believe it avoids corruption and waste far better than other forms of aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a solar energy company called Greenskies Renewable Energy

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It sets a good example for others.  I plan on using my future lending as a inspiration for the kids that I teach.  A little bit of giving can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language in Taiwan.

lenders.name: CareLoan
lenders.loan_because: These loans allow hardworking individuals to truly lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our goal is to become one of Kiva.org's largest single lenders. Through your donations, via PayPal, we will create an invaluable resource for the microlending community. We will lend our funds again and again multiplying the effects of even the smallest donation.  Getting involved is easy!  You can visit our site and follow us on Twitter @CareLoan.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to reward hardworking people and learn about their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: People pay me to give them advice when they are sad or worried or having problems in their marriage or want help to know how to raise their children.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I love to be able to help entrepreneurs across the world to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and merchandise products for a large American retailer.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Edmund Burke Quote "nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little".    See what happens when many of us contribute a little . . . .

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of microloans because they make it possible to break the cycle. We're not patronizing people, rather we're giving them the opportunity to lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: the privileged should help others.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: with this small commitment, I wish to bring  hope and opportunity to someone else.  Once there is hope, all our lives are better for it.

lenders.name: Bec
lenders.loan_because: a small loan from me is a huge deal to these people.  Every little bit of help makes a difference.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: It is appropriate to give back to others less fortunate than myself

lenders.name: Brad & Tara
lenders.loan_because: it's more than just a donation.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: In loving memory of a precious baby girl "Ebony Clare"

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I sometimes take for granted how lucky I have been and we need to share.  Thank you for making it possible for me to do this!

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that world peace is possible. If people help each other help themselves, then it's like teaching them to fish.

lenders.name: Allister
lenders.loan_because:
I have to.  
I have a good life.  I want to share that.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to fix things.  How to use the information and tools that are available to them to get a job done.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I love learning about people and their businesses.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: It's hard to be under the thumb of interest payments.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Occupational Therapist. I help people regain or learn skills they need for daily life activies. Currently I am working in a pre-school with children who need help learning how to write and I also work in a Hospital with children who need special wheelchairs.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in one person, on either end of this exchange, making a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I design systems, buildings, manufacturing lines, jobs and other things to be safer and more productive.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I have visited several poverty stricken countries and have some understanding of the need and how just a little can help so much.  Also how thankful these people generally are.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: If you dream big...you should get a chance to chase it.

lenders.name: Niky
lenders.loan_because: a small amount can make such a big difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have limited means to do so and Kiva lets me combine my loan with others to help someone out.
lenders.occupational_info: Office work for a large university.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: If we change the way we see materialism, then we will be more giving to those in need. The luxury of our income should be shared with the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: Yoga is the journey of finding your true potential and pure light. Youth Probation is the journey of helping others find theirs.

lenders.name: Kym-Maree
lenders.occupation: Office Administration - Self Employed. Glazing Com

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to support free enterprise and help people build their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide software and training to architects and builders.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: The idea that someone could really change there lives with money sent from me and others really does make the world a smaller place.
lenders.occupational_info: Once you have a income I help people make the most efficent use of the money they make.

lenders.name: Nina Jean
lenders.loan_because: I can. Its' the least that I can do and (for selfish reasons) it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: I make objects that have no real purpose except to look interesting and often they make people smile. I love what I do. It makes me smile too!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: change happens from the collective efforts of individuals.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to fulfill their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mother of 2 young children.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: ..because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in intercultural communications.

lenders.name: Heather Walter
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people and places I may never meet or visit, but still have a positive impact on.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I like to give people a helping hand if I can, and this is something I can do to help other women.  This in turn helps children, and the whole community.  Being self employed gives women confidence and allows them to explore their capabilities.  It shows their children that they can do anything they want with their lives.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: i'm an acountant at my mothers firm

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.occupational_info: I look after children in their home, while their parents go to work.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Martijn
lenders.loan_because: It's a good direct way to help people get their business off the ground in difficult enviroments

lenders.name: federex
lenders.loan_because: i want to start my own internet cafe business. since it is popular here in our place and i want to support my family with it.
lenders.occupational_info: having an internet cafe will help people here in our place to communicate with their relatives on other countries. thats why i want to take this opportunity because most of our neighbors have a relatives outside of our country

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
It is right to do so.
I feel empowered to be able to choose who I loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: The land knows how it wants to be treated and what it needs to be healed.  By opening I hear the whispers and relay the messages to stewards of the land.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky and blessed in life and its important to spread that around :)!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer (mostly philosophy and fictional crime with a strong emphasis in psychology) and a musician (voice, oboe, piano & clarinet).  I also coach Speech & Debate at one of our local high schools.

lenders.name: Anca
lenders.occupation: doctor dentist disabled professional retired medic

lenders.name: Richard & Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We know that lending money helps people who want to improve their family income.
lenders.occupational_info: We do three different things. Richard works with computers.  We care for people with disabilities.  We trade shares on the stock market.

lenders.name: SRI ENY
lenders.loan_because: I am Eny from Bali Indonesia. I am make handycraft products,which reflects the culture and heritage of Java and Bali. I need financial help to make my bussiness viable
lenders.occupational_info: I made products at java island,and take to bali for sale the products

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I was so lucky to have been born in this country where I have had every opportunity to learn every skill that I wanted to learn and to become what I desired.  I believe everyone should have opportunities to improve their lives, especially women in developing countries without the "protection" of men. This era of self-sufficiency and "equal" rights for women in America, is arguably the most free and self-determined period for women in recorded history.  I feel very fortunate to be able to take full advantage of these rights and to extend them to other women in developing countries, as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught Psychology at an Historically Black University (HBCU)  for 25 yrs and then became the planning, research, and grants vice pres at a state minority institution (MI).

lenders.name: Leonie
lenders.loan_because: The power in having is being able to give

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: The circle of Karma

lenders.name: Kaden & Tayla
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.....

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Because I can. 
Because microloans are great. 
Because the internet makes such a good thing possible.
Because we atheists are far more prepared to take our moral obligations seriously.

lenders.name: Jacky
lenders.loan_because: I love that such a small amount of money can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology and help to bridge the gap between technical and business teams.  I'm also the mother of 2 fabulous boys and I strive to be a good example to them every day.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share

lenders.name: Suzannah
lenders.loan_because:
I can - 
I wish to make a difference in the life of somebody less fortunate than myself.  I love this opportunity to empower people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a catering business which primarily operates at festivals.  I am presently studying towards a masters degree in applied social science (counselling) and mind/body medicine for ourselves and the planet

lenders.name: Cesar Campos
lenders.loan_because:
There isn't a better feeling than to have the opportunity to help someone that is not so privileged to achieve their goals.
"It is better to give, than it is to receive!"
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an avid freelance writer, Internet and SEO marketer. I also enjoy offering small business and online business advice within the home based business sector.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in a small way to entrepeneurs that I can relate to via this site. I have lived in Africa, worked in the Middle East, have a French husband and my father now lives in Indonesia, so I have a strong transcultural interest!
lenders.occupational_info: I educate nurses at a university in Southern England.

lenders.name: Nikos
lenders.loan_because: I see lending from somebody that can give to somebody that temporarily need as something that helps everybody ...
lenders.occupational_info: Web Developer

lenders.name: Moustapha and Rana
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Moustapha is a Research scientist and Rana is Senior Health administrator at foreign embassy in Washington DC.

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: I really appreciate the KIVA organization and find the direct impact these funds have on the lives of the borrowers, their families and their surrounding community is truly amazing.  It's also a great opportunity for us to teach our kids about geography, other cultures and the issues that people face in developing countries that we might take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info:
Personally, I enjoy spending time and traveling with family, sailing (yes you can sail in Kansas), coaching soccer and learning new things. 

Professionally,  I help successful people make smart decisions with their money.

lenders.name: Ren
lenders.loan_because:
The service we render others is the rent we pay for our room on earth.
-Wilfred Grenfell
lenders.occupational_info: I work in policy and corporate social responsibility for pension funds.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Grandpa gave me a gift card and it's (kiva) an  awesome idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I bug mom until her hair goes gray.

lenders.name: Kenneth & Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now Ken works for an electric company and I stay at home and do volunteer work.  He will soon be leaving his job but may find part time job.

lenders.name: JoAnne
lenders.loan_because: I have 125 students in my 8th grade social studies classes, and each student donated money so we could make loans to 5 different businesses.   It is my hope that they understand we are all part of one world,  and that they find satisfaction from helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach U.S. history to 8th grade (13 and 14 year old) students.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of women and the more this becomes a reality, the better this world will be.

lenders.name: C.H. Low
lenders.loan_because: I hope the people I can help will forever be able to keep improving their lives hereafter by their own effort; and they can pay forward to others in return lifting their community as a whole. Give a person a fish, they eat for a day. Give a person the ability to fish, they eat forever!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a CEO/CTO/EVP Product Management in 7+ startup and early stage software and Internet SaaS companies.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: Giving a small amount of money can make a big difference to someone else.

lenders.name: Jim & Syndie best
lenders.loan_because: little way to make world a better place

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to take a positive step, no matter how small it feels, toward eliminating poverty.  I've always felt too small to make a difference but after I discovered this website, I realized that it creates an opportunity for lots of individuals to make big changes in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help local, state, and Federal government agencies exercise and update their emergency response plans.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.occupation: Student at The University of Texas

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back
lenders.occupational_info: I run the office for 3 restaurants and do all the paperwork involved with running a retail business

lenders.name: Mitchell
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Traditional charities have taken too much money and done too little and I believe in the adage "Give a person a fish and you feed him for a day, teach them to fish and you feed them for life".

lenders.name: Richard, Christine, K
lenders.loan_because: it is helping the poorest of the poor

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business. I started mine during the toughest market conditions, but that pales in comparison to your hardships. It would give me great pleasure to see you succeed. Work hard and believe in yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stock market analyst and I specialize in product called options. I write a number of newsletters that provide trading ideas and education to other option traders. This activity is very much like starting your own business.

lenders.name: Laura and her boys
lenders.loan_because: We all need a helping hand. None of us got to where we are by ourselves. We all have had someone, a parent, a teacher, a friend, that gave of themselves to benefit us. When we help each other, we build a stronger and happier community /  world. When we work together, magnificent things are accomplished.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time photographer &  mom of 2 boys (ages 8 & 10). I am also very involved with my son’s school, sports activities, Cub Scout Pack and Toastmasters International where I volunteer my time.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to to read and make music in a public school.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: independent entrepreneurs are amazing people.

lenders.name: James Warren
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way
lenders.occupational_info: University lecturer and administrator

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because:
What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other.
    - George Eliot
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work at a university and teach people how to use computers.  Now I teach kids how to grow vegetables and volunteer with the Special Olympics http://www.sotx.org/

lenders.name: Sharon

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I believe so strongly in empowering those who are already making a difference in their community.

lenders.name: Elliot

lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying history at the graduate level.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.occupational_info: Im in highschool. That means over 7 hours of school each day. After school, I play soccer with a team for 2 hours. I sometimes do a paper route, (I give people newspaper) and get money from that.

lenders.loan_because: it feels good

lenders.loan_because: it costs so little and is so effective.  It's also nice to know where the loan is going and what it's purpose is.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe  that , "To those that much has been given, much is expected."
lenders.occupational_info: I work building and maintaining computer and communication networks.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity who otherwise may not have one.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my team become a world-class organization.

lenders.name: gary
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.occupational_info: Business education for rural entrepreneurs helps them make better decisions and be more successful with their borrowed money.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It's easy and I wish I had had this option when I needed just a bit to get by on.

lenders.name: A & B
lenders.loan_because: People need assistance and it makes us feel good.  Help others help themselves!

lenders.name: Karthik
lenders.loan_because: I ant to make a positive difference in people's life who need that most.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a strongly data-driven management consultant advising private equity firms and corporate clients on management and marketing strategy, pricing and brand strategy.

lenders.name: Anju
lenders.loan_because: There are many out there that need help and the thought that I can make a small transaction with the push of a button, and change someones life for the better, is mind blowing~ Thank you Kiva for providing this service!
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping the world be more green with our paperless software solution!

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving back to fellow entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote products, programs and resources that uplift and inspire people to be their best.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because:
I know  that it could be me on the other side asking for a loan.  I was born in Guatemala and was lucky enough to grow up in America where my life drastically changed.  When I go back and visit my family, though not all are poor, I wonder what my life could have turned out to be.  

I loan because I know that this gives people an opportunity to pursue a passion, or a chance to live life and hopefully to truly enjoy it instead of just getting by.  

I loan for the hope I have in humanity.

lenders.name: rachel
lenders.loan_because: many people helped me get to where I am, I feel so blessed and I just want to help others in the way I was helped
lenders.occupational_info: I am a school teacher.  I teach history to high school, inner city, at risk youth

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: We may not change the world, but we can make a difference in one person's life with $25.
lenders.occupational_info: I will be leaving the Army soon because we do more harm than good in the world.

lenders.name: International Ladies Club kingwood
lenders.loan_because: Want to help women in need

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because:
When you give to others the feeling you get back is fantastic! 

I grew up on a grain and cattle farm in Saskatchewan, Canada.  I know the impact even one piece of livestock can make to a family; I choose to support livestock and agricultural enterprises.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a communications company as a problem solver and writer.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping people healthy

lenders.name: Elaina
lenders.loan_because: People who don't have a dream don't have much. I want to help people reach for their dreams.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that making what seems like a small effort on my part can have a greater impact in the lives of others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies and entrepreneurs to test their new product or service ideas with the people or businesses that might eventually want to buy them.  We tell them if an idea is good or not, and how it can be improved so it is most appealing to the people they want to pay for it.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world achieve their goals, but with a sense that they made the money rather than taking it from someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in an International School in Moscow, Russia (Москва, Россия)!!

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people create new answers to needs others have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have trouble trusting  to learn to get along better with others.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business of my own and have experienced nothing but success. I want to share that.
lenders.occupational_info: I install and care for ornamental gardens.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: because it feels good.

lenders.name: Steve and Michele
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given much is expected", and it's just the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: there's nothing more important or satisfying than helping another person.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the government prepare for and respond to disasters.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: helping people to help themselves is very rewarding. I have a blessed life and want to make others feel that way about their lives. Pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: Manage a team in a  highspeed internet call center in TampaBay. Supporting highspeed internet connections and Voice over IP phone.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I know there are hard working people out there that need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Gregorio
lenders.loan_because: improve women's condition in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I would like to do better than heal physical ailment.

lenders.name: Mr. Lee and Students

lenders.name: Monrray
lenders.loan_because: I'm very fortunate in life. I hope to help people who work hard to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Maria Kristel
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do and it makes you feel so good!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes and make dreams come true! :)

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: It only takes a few minutes to enable other people to grasp the opportunities of a lifetime.  We live in such a rich and over-saturated world, that to share only a tiny part of our wealth is the very least any of us should do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in surgery and accident and emergency medicine. I help to save lives and to improve people's health.

lenders.name: Shweta
lenders.loan_because:
Every person deserves an opportunity to rise above poverty. These are hard working people with a will but no means. I love the inspiring stories of hope and strength. 

This is an amazing project that provides a platform for direct participation. I am thankful for the opportunity to help.

lenders.name: Lucabella
lenders.loan_because: they inspire me.

lenders.name: Margot
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference for others who don't have the opportunities I have enjoyed.
lenders.occupational_info: Case Management of low income parents towards educational and financial self sufficiency goals, through a grant funded program at local community and technical college. Part time, I'm a vocal artist.

lenders.name: Kerry-Anne
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I need and want to help others get closer to that.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students with disabilities to find and develop their strengths. Animals are another passion of mine - they remind me of children!

lenders.name: Jens
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should. I was born into a small and well-off tribe at the outskirts of civilization. To a small nation, Iceland. I have no idea as to why I am so blessed to be here amongst the world´s wealthiest few? But, I know this much: we are all born into this world the same and should deserve an equal chance in life. And if I can, remotely level the paying field for a few  South of here, then maybe there is a chance we can change the world one Kiva loan at a time?
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to computers, set-top boxes and television screens all day in an effort to make them understand one another. Some days are better than others!

lenders.name: Paddy
lenders.loan_because: great oaks from little acorns grow
lenders.occupational_info:
Sometimes boring  work , but it pays my bills,
So i am grateful that i can provide for my family and consider myself very fortunate that i have some money to lend those who need it more than i do.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and would like to give to someone who needs help to improve their life
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to young children in a local Hong Kong school

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: ...Let's help others to help themselves!

lenders.name: Cortney
lenders.loan_because: there are people with real needs that i can help
lenders.occupational_info: physical, fulfilling and fun

lenders.name: Lauren & Trevor
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: Lauren writes and works as an editor for a small book publisher.  Trevor creates computer software that monitors water supplies.

lenders.name: Peter and Kristen
lenders.loan_because: It's a fun way to help people.
